conbody.p: Content Assist dialog pops-up when the keyboard short-cut Ctrl+Spacebar is pressed within an editor view. And, content assist is automatically activated upon typing the character ‘.’ (period) on any Object.The dialog provides coding help by making available list of all applicable T24 code elements for the location where content assist was activated from. Content assist could be invoked on T24 elements like source names, insert file names, objects, methods, keywords and Variables.

li.p: Coding help would be provided to the Subroutine names, Program names and Insert file names.

Much similar to the source files, content assist request could be made for T24 objects names. Name of the object followed by ‘.’ would bring all available methods in the object for completion. Here, ‘.’ acts as an auto activation character.
Content assist is available for T24/jBASE keywords and variables.
